elements.name: Verify that user can add one item to the cart

User sees Categories box menu
User clicks one of the category "Phones"
User clicks on the item title name "Samsung galaxy s7"
User clicks Add To Cart button
Verify the alert message "Product added"
User clicks on the Global Navigation Menu "Cart"
Verify the list of item on Cart Menu "Samsung galaxy s7"
Verify the total price of the items
